businessmodel.restrictions

Class SportBodyRestriction

  • java.lang.Object
    • businessmodel.restrictions.Restriction
      • businessmodel.restrictions.SportBodyRestriction

  • public class SportBodyRestriction
extends Restriction
    A class representing a restriction that checks for the mandatory options and categories for a set of options with a sport body.
    Author:
    SWOP team 10 2013-2014
